resource-utils.config.title: Resource Utils Config
resource-utils.config.category.general.d: General options that change how the mod itself works.
resource-utils.config.category.quick-uti: Some quick utilities that might be useful for you.
The option to modify the in-game brightness.
resource-utils.config.option.pumpkin_opa: The opacity of the pumpkin overlay when worn.
resource-utils.config.option.clearer_wit: Displays clearer wither hearts rather than the normal ones. Texture Credit: VanillaTweaks. You should check them out!
resource-utils.config.option.low_fire.de: Modify the amount that the fire effect will be lowered by.
resource-utils.config.option.low_held_up: Modify the amount that a held up shield will be lowered by.
resource-utils.config.option.low_side_sh: Modify the amount that a shield will be lowered by whilst not being actively used.
resource-utils.config.option.small_fire_: Display smaller flames on ground and when the player is on fire in third person.
resource-utils.config.option.side_shield: Display the shield on the side.
resource-utils.config.option.shield_size: Modify the size of a shield from 100%. WARNING: This might clash with Low Shield and make the shield not visible.
resource-utils.config.option.small_totem: Modify the amount that the totem effect should be reduced by.
resource-utils.config.option.no_explosio: The option to disable explosion sounds. Recommended for Crystal and Minecraft PvP.
resource-utils.config.option.no_lava_fog: The option to disable lava fog.
resource-utils.config.option.no_underwat: The option to disable underwater fog.
resource-utils.config.option.no_powder_s: The option to disable powder snow fog.
resource-utils.config.option.no_nether_f: The option to disable nether fog.
resource-utils.config.option.no_overworl: The option to disable overworld fog.
The option to disable sky fog.
resource-utils.config.option.no_darkness: The option to disable darkness fog.
resource-utils.config.option.no_blindnes: The option to disable blindness fog.
